alert.note: Alert for Coahoma; DeSoto; Panola; Quitman; Tallahatchie; Tate; Tunica (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 05 at 2:47AM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of DeSoto, southeastern Coahoma, eastern Tunica, Tate, Tallahatchie, Quitman and Panola Counties through 330 AM CDT... At 247 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near T O Fuller State Park to near Dubbs to near Dublin. Movement was east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Southaven, Olive Branch, Horn Lake, Clarksdale, Hernando, Senatobia, Batesville, Charleston, John W Kyle State Park, Tutwiler, Marks, Sardis, Coldwater, Lambert, Jonestown, Como, Walls, Crenshaw, Crowder and Webb. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 400 AM CDT for eastern Arkansas...and northwestern Mississippi.

area.areaDesc: Coahoma; DeSoto; Panola; Quitman; Tallahatchie; Tate; Tunica
